name: Voxense
description: VOXENSE is a Spatial DePIN network that turns real-world sensor activity such as GPS, motion, ambient signals, and audio fingerprints into cryptographic Proof-of-Sensing on Solana. Instead of uploading raw data, devices generate local hashed and signed fingerprints, allowing the network to verify real environmental conditions without exposing personal information. VOXENSE enables a new Scan-to-Earn economy, where everyday devices can act as sensing nodes, earn rewards, and contribute to a decentralized reality layer. This verified sensor data powers applications in AI, robotics, spatial computing, and the upcoming VOXENSE mobile app and marketplace.
